feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: modal logic for assignment reminder by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15488
  • fix: typo license key env type api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15519
  • fix: [CAL-3940] randomize Tip Sidebar by @jscafe-dev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15469
  • refactor: v2 event-types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15457
  • fix: AvailabilitySettings atom closing override window button by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15518
  • feat: Add Hungarian support by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14484
  • fix: Dashboard theme description in multiple languages by @Neon-20 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15486
  • fix: isChildEvent issue + loader is shown forever by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15524
  • fix: create instant meeting error if DAILY_SCALE_PLAN is false by @kart1ka in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15508
  • fix: Webex app not working by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15485
  • fix: #15487 select arbitary start time by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15523
  • chore: Only run E2E suite when ready-for-e2e label added by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15529
  • fix: New CI workflow flaws in detecting the ready-for-e2e label on PRs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15534
  • chore: Make ready-for-e2e label check more robust by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15536
  • chore: Add GH actions test branch by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15541
  • chore: streamline ready-for-e2e label check for PRs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15545
  • chore: Remove check for labeled action by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15547
  • fix: v2 event-types versioning by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15549
  • chore: Attempt reduction of Sentry size by treeshaking tracing by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15527
  • fix: Translation for Dashboard Theme box is not available in all languages #15480 by @Yasshu55 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15484
  • fix: zoom shows up as location when expired instead of cal by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15153
  • feat: add monthly annual billing org form by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15520
  • fix: SAML: invalid_code issue, missing user error signing up by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15522
  • refactor: loadUsers and move to separate file by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15532
  • chore: IsOrg guard api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15563
  • fix: git-setup.sh to account for website default branch change by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15560
  • fix: stop shrinking icon when content overflows by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15565
  • fix: IsOrgGuard apiv2 casing by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15566
  • fix: Include business-days-plugin and window types in platform utils and types tsconfigs by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15569
  • chore: Release v4.2.2 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15568

New Contributors

  • @jscafe-dev made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15469
  • @Yasshu55 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15484

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.1...v4.2.2

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: IsTeamInOrg guard and decorator apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15567
  • chore: IsUserInOrg guard by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15579
  • chore: Cache timezones by calcom version by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15556
  • fix: team billing on batch operations by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15570
  • chore: Removed unwanted CI changes that made it into main by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15580
  • feat: add instant meeting expiry input by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15555
  • fix: exclude web wrappers from dist by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15572
  • chore: Update PR template by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15581
  • chore: minimum required roles guard api-v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15576
  • fix: office365video expiry_date by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15561
  • feat: setting background color to red for remove button in profile section when hovered by @sbsangu in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15585
  • chore: Add dynamic import and trigger captureException by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15583
  • fix: Error in team members migration during org onboarding by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15349
  • fix: PATCH /me endpoint should capitalize timezone apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15593
  • fix: cancel sub when movingTeamToOrg by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15594
  • feat: organizations teams endpoints apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15586
  • fix: reduce cal recording bitrate by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15588
  • feat: apple calendar connect atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15510
  • fix: update version apiv2 platform libraries for createNewUsersConnectToOrgIfExists by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15601
  • fix: update z-index for intercom app launcher by @osamajandali in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15516
  • fix: Avoid error when moving a team that just has the owner of the org by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15595
  • feat: organization schedules endpoints by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15584
  • fix: E2E tests problems on PRs by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15603
  • feat: booking no show webhook by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15502
  • fix: getPublicEventType of NonOrgUser fetch OrgUser event-type of same username by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15587
  • chore: v4.2.3 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15604

New Contributors

  • @sbsangu made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15585
  • @osamajandali made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15516

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.2...v4.2.3

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.2.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Rescheduling email when there is broken calendar integration by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15669
  • fix: disable google-meet in user onboarding if google-calendar is not installed by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15702
  • fix: set conferencing apps as default by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15376
  • chore: add i18n to atoms by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15698
  • feat: add POST end point to mark calls as no-shows by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15690
  • revert: "fix: Autodetection of time zone only updated default time zone" by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15720
  • chore: cache org guard and fix roles guard apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15719
  • chore: sort calendar crendentials in event manager by @Shaik-Sirajuddin in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15448
  • fix: Text in Embed Code Visibility Fixed by @anku909 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15711
  • fix: api-v2 controllers e2e tests by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15724
  • fix: remove console.log and tsignore apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15732
  • fix: event type back button by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15722
  • fix: api v2 unit tests by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15733
  • chore: v4.2.5 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15735

New Contributors

  • @anku909 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15711

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.4...v4.2.5

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Campsite conferencing app by @nholden in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15713
  • feat: BookerEmbed atom by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15689
  • chore: [app-router-migration] - add missing getServerSideProps to /event-types by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15731
  • fix: Ensure unique username in an organization by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15730
  • chore: add check for booking by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15740
  • fix: icon visibility and add up and down icons by @Sahillather002 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15543
  • chore: readme platform libraries by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15737
  • chore: fix apiv2 org teams doc by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15746
  • chore: Update README.md by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15766
  • chore: Release v4.3.0 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15771

New Contributors

  • @nholden made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15713
  • @Sahillather002 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15543

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.2.5...v4.3.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: platform libraries versions cleanup api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15768
  • fix: higher resolution Campsite icon by @nholden in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15777
  • refactor: allow system admins to create event-type without membership by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15774
  • chore: add platform-libraries change log by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15786
  • fix: filter admin_api if org is present by @Neon-20 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15386
  • fix: #15749 Display availability page as per weekstart setting by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15753
  • chore: specify platform-libraries version for event-types by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15785
  • feat: allow passing initial data props to calendar connectors by @satya-nutella in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15760
  • chore: Update /ee README.md by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15765
  • fix: Enable embed namespacing again by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15783
  • feat: Fix Proton Calendar with ICS by @sekaiking in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15454
  • fix: creating organization team should add owner by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15779
  • feat: API org user scope by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15739
  • docs(contributing): change fork link by @Just-Moh-it in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15792
  • fix: remove permission blocking public apiv2 event-types endpoint by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15801
  • chore: removed cal.ai email assistant by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15793
  • fix: booker readded border by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15798
  • fix: fetch workflows on the backend by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15796
  • fix: Add signout button on onboarding screen by @NitinPSingh in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15807
  • fix: findOrgUser use profiles instead of organizationId apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15808
  • chore: set managed user locale via api v2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15794
  • feat: V2 Org Memberships by @alishaz-polymath in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15578
  • chore: Introduce a new class WebAppURL that extends URL by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14982
  • fix: Check URL by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15815
  • feat: Salesforce - Disable creating new contacts by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15780
  • chore: v4.3.1 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15817

New Contributors

  • @satya-nutella made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15760
  • @sekaiking made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15454
  • @Just-Moh-it made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15792
  • @NitinPSingh made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/15807

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.3.0...v4.3.1
